main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Corpus Christi, Texas, on November 7, 1955, for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared oval and silvery in color., It was observed by multiple persons employed at the local naval air station., The object made no sound and traveled at a high rate of speed., Occasionally, it would stop and hover briefly before resuming rapid flight., The sighting was reported to the USAF and investigated by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: oval silvery object in the sky
witness description: employees at the local naval air station
